text: Radha and Krishna's divine love story symbolizes the eternal bond between soul and God.
Bhakti Marg means the path of devotion. It teaches surrender and love towards the Supreme.
Lord Krishna's teachings in Bhagavad Gita guide humanity towards righteousness and self-realization.
Vrindavan is the holy place where Lord Krishna performed many divine pastimes with Radha and the gopis.
In Bhakti Yoga, devotion, love, and surrender are the keys to spiritual enlightenment.
